text: The Little Mermaid () is a 1968 Soviet animated movie directed by Ivan Aksenchuk.РУСАЛОЧКА (1968)Русалочка (1968) ==Actors== *Nina Gulyayeva as The Little Mermaid. *Lidiya Korolyova as the fish guide. *Roza Makagonova as the princess who saved the prince *Viktoriya Ivanova as singing voice of The Little Mermaid. *Anatoli Papanov as the human tour guide. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1968 movies Category:1960s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: The Little Mermaid (1968 movie)
